titleStmt.title: The serious attestation of many thousands, religious and well disposed people living in London, Westminster, borough of Southwark, and parts adjoyning.

notesStmt.note: Professing loyalty to the Commonwealth--cf Thomason catalogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "you are ye [illegible] forthwth and to keepe them by you [illegible] are called for-".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
